UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel human bioactive peptides identified in apolipoprotein B: evaluation of their therapeutic potential.
Literature.Author: Gaglione R, Dell'Olmo E, Bosso A, Chino M, Pane K, Ascione F, Itri F, Caserta S, Amoresano A, Lombardi A, Haagsman HP, Piccoli R, Pizzo E, Veldhuizen EJ, Notomista E, Arciello A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>40µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis 706 RIVM(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus WKZ-2(MIC=>40µM),Bacillus atrophaeus BM013(MIC=5µM),Bacillus licheniformis ATCC 21424(MIC=1.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>40µM)
